title: Multiple NA Servers
body: When, if ever, will NA get multiple servers?

replies.body:
Likely never.  It costs $ and would disrupt the current system.  People wouldn't be able to play so well with their friends across the country, and this could even potentially split up pro teams.

That or it would create a "serious" server where all the pros are and a "fun" server that becomes embarrassing for people to remain on.
